item.description:
You can make the vision boards, you can diligently take all the actions... yet if you are not at one with your TRUE YOU, you might not create the success, the joy that you truly want.

Who YOU are is beyond your physical self. It's the self that is your Spirit-Self .... Source Energy...Higher Self....deeper wisdom.

Many of us know this as a concept & even believe in it; yet it's still "out there", in an abstract way, versus truly experiencing & feeling from within.  When you are at one with your greatest, highest self, everything flows easily to you.

So how do you transcend the "smaller you" & physical "reality"?

Ann & Mark Ide, New Possibilities Life Coaches & BostonLOA members, will 

- guide us to feel the connection & oneness with Spirit/Source, to BE at one with your TRUE YOU.

- share ways for you to access your TRUE YOU whenever you are stuck, feeling alone & separate, or feel like you have to make things happen.

This is the surest "way" to get clarity of true purpose, true happiness & is the speediest way to manifest more of what you truly desire.

****************************************************************

About Ann & Mark Ide

www.NewPossibilitiesCoaching.com

Ann is a certified master practitioner in Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP) & Hypnotherapy, & a certified NLP Life Coach. She coaches people to move beyond struggles & mere survival, to thrive in harmony, happiness & success. With her expert questioning, inner exploration processes & personal change interventions, clients become emotionally & spiritually aligned to more easily create the happiness & well-being they want. 

Mark has been a successful business consultant for over 20 years, using his skills to bring greater harmony, happiness & success to the workplace. He is a certified master professional leadership & management coach.

In addition to leading guided meditation classes, business workshops, & coaching private clients, Ann & Mark co-lead the Metro West Law of Attraction Meetup & their 13 week New Possibilities Group Coaching Program. 

***************************************************************

RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming. 
We provide handouts & have appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your understanding & support!

**************************************************************
For parking & directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft : 
(1) Go here: http://www.meetup.com/lawofattraction-us/files/
(2) Log in 
(3) Scroll down and open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Surest way to manifesting the TRUE life, success & happiness you want
